data.title: Can I change my data center?
data.meta_description: Find the desired hosting plan and click Manage. Then click on the kebab menu and select Relocate from the drop-down menu.
data.text:
You can change the data center for all sites in your hosting plan.

If you want to change the data center location of your Cloud hosting plan, go to your Client Area > Services > Hosting and click Manage next to the plan you wish to relocate. Then click on the kebab menu and select Relocate from it. You can pick the new location of your Cloud server from the Select Your New Location drop down menu.
